key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting borrower defaults and earnings volatility
Economic sensitivity leading to higher default rates during downturns
Regulatory scrutiny and potential changes impacting business model
Portfolio concentration risk in sectors like healthcare and technology
Cybersecurity and compliance risks affecting financial reporting
controversies: High management fees and potential conflicts of interest with external management structure
Dividend sustainability concerns due to high yield and economic sensitivity
governance_issues: External management structure with high fees and governance concerns
Potential conflicts of interest with FS/KKR Advisor, LLC
